::Zardus/Prowl/Reptilica/The Oblitercons::

Zardus growls at Arcangel, dodging a missile. "That will be the day of your 
death," he says, then turns to Soundwave.

"What is it that you wanted to talk to me about?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica exits the base, Prowl and the others walking out behind him (at 
least the others are if they're still following him). Reptilica looks at 
Prowl. "Allright, you're out, now give me the detonator."

Prowl glances from Reptilica to Zardus, who was facing the other direction a 
few hundred feet away, talking to another bot.

"At the edge of the clearing," Prowl says, continuing to walk forward. He 
stops as Reptilica starts moving, "The escort stays."

Reptilica stops, growling. "Allright, go. All of you."

Prowl contintinues to the edge of the clearing, hoping the others were still 
behind him.

"Allright," he says, "When I throw this, we all run. If you ladies are too 
tired, me and Dinobot will carry you."

Prowl stops, waiting for the Maximals to respond. Behind him, standing at the 
entrance of the Alliance base, are Punch, Scattershot, Pyro, Dark One, 
Bloodystrike, and Reptilica, ready to pursue the Maximals as soon as Prowl 
throws the device...
